Title: Requires persons engaged in the installation, improvement, repair and maintenance of medical gas piping or the instruction thereof to be licensed
Summary: Requires persons engaged in the installation, improvement, repair and maintenance of medical gas piping or the instruction thereof to be licensed by the department of state.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring master plumbers engaged in the installation, repair or maintenance of medical gas piping or engaged in the instruction to be licensed by the department of state
